title: WIN Wednesdays: Natala Menezes
content: This week's WIN Wednesday Woman is 500 Startup Mentor Natala Menezes. She is currently the co-founder of The Shoestring Agency, focused on resourceful and innovative marketing and product development. She is interested in building efficient, beautiful and delightful self-serve web applications. Previously, she worked at Google, Microsoft, Amazon, TeachStreet & Gigwalk. Follow her on Twitter here.
